amendment.description: To provide that the Intelligence Community Reserve Corps shall have a personnel strength level authorized by law.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3717 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3717 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S10248-10250; text: CR S10249) To provide that the Intelligence Community Reserve Corps shall have a personnel strength level authorized by law.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3717 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3717 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Feinstein.
